title: PBE Preview: Pulsefire Caitlyn – Gameplay Reveal

replies.body: I like her hair. While the hat's color or style is kind of unmatched :D
i would like to add that she pulls one of 5 hats out of the portal, its random which had she grabs, one is a Teemo hat that we buy from the riot store
I like the hat like that actually because its a reminder of who she used to be before she went pulsefire.
You can still go classic Cait, y'know...
That's not the point, the theme is that Caitlyn is coming back from the future, so I like the part where she has her original hat just for that reason, whether it matches or not

but her classic hat is purple and not magenta
which means it isn't her old hat
they should tune it to an indigo shade or something

Doesn't really matter. Old Cait isn't dead. This skin isn't her from "the future." This is a Caitlyn from a different universe that crosses space and time. That hat isn't even hers. Caitlyn's hat didn't gave cutesy little purple roses on them, and her hat had yellow stripes. Not sure where you are going with "Reminder of who she originally was."

PLUS, 
Caits hat is way longer than this one.. That's not her hat.
The hat changes randomly when she recalls watch the SkinSpotlights video
Dude screw off with your fake promo BS. Riot how do you allow scams like this on your forums?
I like how she doesn't have that stupid bang that never moves and looks like it's made of plastic.

when the 1820 pulsefire skin is nicer than the ultimate one.
feelsbadrito
they updating the Ult skin as well
they should just update it first fr

What about Pulsefire Urgot {{champion:6}} ?
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Screw that, I want star guardian urgot{{champion:6}} 
or, just maybe, HIS GOD DAMN REWORK!!!!
Don't worry, he's up next and will probably be in by the end of the year!
Pulsefire becomes the first series with 1 Ultimate + 1 Legendary, and nothing else!
and the awkward hat
5 hats...
This is sick! Glad Caitlyn is finally getting a legendary skin with a sick new voiceover. :D
Really glad the sheriff isn't in a mini skirt tbh

Like, I don't understand why these PulseFire skins are coming out pretty.... basic. Pulsefire (to me) is a pretty good skin series to create, but it isn't being made to be worth the price. Like this skin honestly is equaled with HeadHunter Caitlyn and the only difference between them is the voice change. Like look at it this way guys.... Project skins vs all the other series skins, such as the new Dark Stars, Warring Kingdoms, Cosmics, and etc... I know Riot has plans though so we just need to wait on different and more innovated ideas with this series.

The gun changed everytime you put a level into the ult. Visual changes are usually reserved for ultimate skins. This is actually very worth and do you know how hard it is to create futuristic particles? Much harder than you would think. Pay more attention to what the teaser contains before jumping to conclusions.
Caitlyn can have a Pulsefire skin, but graves can't have a... Oh...
they just dont understand the jokes implication yet....give it time {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
When the gun is bigger than the gal, you know its going to be a good time.
Perfect examples: Tristana and Jinx.
SICK looking skin!!!!
The hat is an animation on recall... it changes each time she uses it. It doesn't stay on her person.
So, uh... does this mean Pulsefire Ezreal will finally get an update? Come on plz Riot {{item:3070}}
Don't worry, a new VO is on PBE and hopefully visuals will follow
Whew! Thanks for that.
holy shit.. i dont play adc.. but JEALOUS!!! would TOTALLY buy if i played her..

Am Caitlyn main. Am mastery 6 ;-;

But I'm a little confused (as i'm in bronze) as to why adc is so weak. I think that adcs are very fun to play and in ranked if you play well then you can end up winning and carrying the team. Hence the term, ADC. (I'm climbing ~75% winrate stop mocking me for being bronze ;-;)

Adc is a bit weak in this tank meta, if u fall just a little bit behind or even top and/or mid lane gets fed, its over. Thats why being a top/ or mid lane is very reliable right now because you can hard carry easier than adc
Ok thank you
This skin really reminds me of Talon Widowmaker.

I think the music hypes up the skin for more than its worth and Caitlyn has a kit that is really hard to work with in the skin making business. I like her head hunter and lunar wraith skins better than this one.

Thats look amazing{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

the screen has an effect when she ults, its like looking through a scope
oH, i was basing myself off the preview, cause you know, thats what we saw. But yeah the changes to the skin are better
yeah i get that, surrenderat20 has more in depth previews when skins hit the pbe. i suggest taking a peek {{item:2045}} there whenever it happens
any thoughts of the release date cant wait to buy it???
Well the skin design just proves that Pulsefire Ezreal is a legendary-standard skin now
Arent they remaking the Pulsefire Ezreal Skin? they should do that to The Magnificent Twisted Fate skin it kinda sucks for a legendary skin...
